div.p: Well, the website provides a lot-I can just go on, and every day it's different.
The newest mail's up there with the newest happenings around campus.
I love how the pictures change every day.
You never see the same old picture.
You see some other pretty part of campus-maybe a statue or just some rolling pastures,
and then student faces is always nice.
So I find everything that I need to know-special events at Christmastime, concerts and things.
It's all there, and it's very inclusive.
So I've benefited from having that resource.
